Method Detail

add

public void add(java.lang.Object element)
Description copied from interface: DrawingModel
Adds a drawing element to the drawing.

The method will fire a PropertyChangeEvent named DrawingModel.EVENT_ADD with the entity set as the new property value. If the extents change as a result of the newly added entity an #EVENT_EXTENTS event will also be fired.

Specified by:
add in interface DrawingModel
Parameters:
element - the element to add

Specified by:

Parameters:
elements - a list of elements to add

addFeature

public void addFeature(java.lang.Object feature)
Description copied from interface: DrawingModel
Adds a feature to the drawing. Layers, linestyles, textstyles, blocks, views and similar data containers are collectively referred to as features. All features share common storage and accessors. The following requirements apply for all features:

  • each stored feature is unique, the same feature instance cannot be added more than once;
  • features may implement a public String getName() method to allow being accessed by name; in this case all names of features of the same class must be distinct (feature of class A with the name "B" cannot be added if there is already a feature of class A and named "B").

In addition to the above, specific rules may apply for the different classes of features.

Fires a DrawingModel.EVENT_FEATURE_ADD PropertyChangeEvent with the feature to be added as the new property parameter.

Specified by:
addFeature in interface DrawingModel
Parameters:
feature - the feature to add
See Also:
DrawingModel.getFeature(Class, String)

removeFeature

public void removeFeature(java.lang.Object feature)
Description copied from interface: DrawingModel
Removes a feature from the drawing.

Fires a DrawingModel.EVENT_FEATURE_REMOVE PropertyChangeEvent with the feature to be removed as the new property parameter.

Specified by:
removeFeature in interface DrawingModel
Parameters:
feature - the feature to remove

setCurrent

public void setCurrent(java.lang.Object feature)
Description copied from interface: DrawingModel
Sets a feature as current.

Fires DrawingModel.EVENT_FEATURE_CURRENT PropertyChangeEvent with the new and old current features stored in the event.

Specified by:
setCurrent in interface DrawingModel
Parameters:
feature - the feature to become current
